Test whether a GTFS feed is frequency based

Source: R/test_gtfs_freq.R
test_gtfs_freq.Rd

Test whether a GTFS feed is frequency based or whether it presents detailed time table for all routes and trip ids.

test_gtfs_freq(gtfs)

Arguments

gtfs

A GTFS data set stored in memory as a list of data.tables/data.frames.

Value

A string "frequency" or "simple".

Examples

# read a gtfs.zip to memory
poa <- read_gtfs(system.file("extdata/poa.zip", package = "gtfs2gps"))
#> Unzipped the following files to /tmp/RtmphQBqoT/gtfsio:
#>   * agency.txt
#>   * calendar.txt
#>   * routes.txt
#>   * shapes.txt
#>   * stop_times.txt
#>   * stops.txt
#>   * trips.txt
#> Reading agency.txt
#> Reading calendar.txt
#> Reading routes.txt
#> Reading shapes.txt
#> Reading stop_times.txt
#> Reading stops.txt
#> Reading trips.txt

# Test whether a GTFS feed is frequency based
test_gtfs_freq(poa)
#> [1] "simple"
